mapper.insert: insert into item (item_category, item_name, item_price, item_unit, item_specifications, item_stockquantity, item_availablestock, item_basicstock, item_storage, item_productionDate, attachment_no) values (#{item_category}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_unit}, #{item_specifications}, #{item_stockquantity}, #{item_availablestock}, #{item_basicstock}, #{item_storage}, #{item_productionDate}, #{attachment_no})
mapper.update: update item set item_category = #{item_category}, item_name = #{item_name}, item_price= #{item_price}, item_unit=#{item_unit}, item_specifications = #{item_specifications}, item_stockquantity = #{item_stockquantity}, item_availablestock=#{item_availablestock}, item_basicstock = #{item_basicstock}, item_storage = #{item_storage}, item_productionDate=#{item_productionDate}, attachment_no= #{attachment_no} where item_no = #{item_no}
